uuid.description: Unique identifier (UUID) assigned to the employee

assigned_manager_id.description: ID of the manager currently assigned to the employee

assigned_finance_manager_ids.description: IDs of finance managers assigned to the employee

summary.description: Summary or brief description of the employee

seniority_id.description: ID indicating the seniority level of the employee

team_id.description: ID of the team to which the employee belongs

department_id.description: ID of the department to which the employee belongs

position_id.description: ID of the position held by the employee

hash_tag_ids.description: IDs of hash tags associated with the employee

note.description: Additional notes or comments about the employee

custom_attributes.description: Custom attributes associated with the employee
